items.title: UnitedHealth names insider Patrick Conway as Optum CEO
items.description: Conway is currently the chief executive officer of Optum Rx, the company's pharmacy benefit management unit.  Conway joined Optum in February 2020 and has held senior leadership roles at Optum Rx and Optum Health.

items.title: UnitedHealth Group: Mr. Market Has Got It All Wrong
items.description: UnitedHealth's stock tanked following the Q1 earnings report after it revised the earnings guidance for this year. Learn more about UNH stock here.
